backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Land a time to meet about Project Alpha with Chris, Sangya, and Kat for 1 hour in the next 2 weeks. Schedule over 1:1s and lunches if needed and work around Kat's schedule. Make the meeting in person and add a room.

gutts.name: Meeting Requirements Extraction
gutts.capability: Parse all requirements (attendees, duration, date range, constraints, modality, resources)
gutts.evidence: Extracted: attendees=[Chris, Sangya, Kat], duration=1hr, window=next 2 weeks, priority_attendee=Kat, modality=in-person, resource=room, override=[1:1s, lunches]

gutts.name: Multi-Person Availability Aggregation
gutts.capability: Check calendars for Chris, Sangya, Kat and merge availability
gutts.user_goal: Find times when all required attendees are available
gutts.evidence: Queried 3 calendars, found 12 slots where at least 2/3 available, 3 slots where all free

gutts.name: Priority Constraint Application (Kat's schedule)
gutts.capability: Ensure primary consideration of Kat's availability
gutts.user_goal: Kat's conflicts are hard constraints, others can be overridden
gutts.evidence: Filtered slots: Kat must be free (hard constraint), Chris/Sangya conflicts can be resolved via override

gutts.name: Override-Eligible Meeting Identification
gutts.capability: Identify 1:1s and lunches that can be rescheduled if needed
gutts.user_goal: System knows which existing meetings are movable
gutts.evidence: Found 5 override-eligible conflicts: 3 1:1s (Chris×2, Sangya×1), 2 lunches (Chris×1, Sangya×1)

gutts.name: Location-Based Filtering
gutts.capability: Filter for in-person meeting capability (office presence, not remote)
gutts.user_goal: Meeting scheduled when in-person attendance is possible
gutts.evidence: Filtered to days when all 3 attendees have in-office calendar entries or no remote indicators

gutts.name: Conference Room Search & Booking
gutts.capability: Find available room for in-person meeting and reserve it
gutts.evidence: Searched conference rooms, found 4 available for 1hr: Conf Room A (capacity 6), Conf Room B (capacity 4), booked Conf Room B

gutts.name: Optimal Slot Selection
gutts.capability: Rank and select best time considering all constraints
gutts.evidence: Scored slots: Wed 2pm (score 95: all free, in-person, room available) selected over Thu 3pm (score 75: requires 1 override)

gutts.name: Conflict Resolution & Rescheduling
gutts.evidence: No overrides needed for selected slot (all attendees free); if needed, would reschedule Chris's 1:1 to Fri 10am

gutts.name: Meeting Creation & Invitations
gutts.capability: Create meeting with all attendees, room, and details
gutts.user_goal: Meeting appears on all calendars with room reserved
gutts.evidence: Created event 'Project Alpha Discussion' Wed 2-3pm with attendees Chris, Sangya, Kat + resource Conf Room B

notes: Generated by GPT-5 - Matches reference decomposition of 9 GUTTs (most complex hero prompt)
